font-weight: 600; } .team-standup-board .reaction-count { font-size: 11px; font-weight: 700; } /* ===== THREE COLUMN LAYOUT ===== */ .team-standup-board .card-body { padding: 16px 20px 20px; } .team-standup-board .standup-columns { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr; gap: 16px; } .team-standup-board .standup-column { border-radius: var(--tsb-radius-sm); background: var(--tsb-bg); overflow: hidden; } .team-standup-board .column-header { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px; padding: 10px 14px; font-size: 12px; font-weight: 700; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.8px; } .team-standup-board .column-header h4 { margin: 0; font-size: 12px; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: 0.8px; } .team-standup-board .yesterday-column .column-header { background: var(--tsb-success-light); color: var(--tsb-success); } .team-standup-board .today-column .column-header { background: var(--tsb-primary-light); color: var(--tsb-primary); } .team-standup-board .blockers-column .column-header { background: #f5f5f5; color: var(--tsb-text-muted); } .team-standup-board .blockers-column.has-content .column-header { background: var(--tsb-danger-light); color: var(--tsb-danger); } .team-standup-board .column-content { padding: 12px 14px; } .team-standup-board .standup-text { font-size: 13px; line-height: 1.7; color: var(--tsb-text-primary); margin: 0; white-space: pre-wrap; word-break: break-word; } .team-standup-board .no-blockers { color: var(--tsb-text-muted); font-size: 13px; font-style: italic; margin: 0; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px; } .team-standup-board .urgent-badge { background: var(--tsb-danger); color: #fff; font-size: 9px; font-weight: 800; padding: 2px 8px; border-radius: 10px; letter-spacing: 1px; margin-left: auto; } .team-standup-board .urgent-badge.pulse { animation: urgentPulse 1.5s ease-in-out infinite; } @keyframes urgentPulse { 0%, 100% { opacity: 1; } 50% { opacity: 0.6; } } .team-standup-board .blocker-actions { margin-top: 12px; padding-top: 10px; border-top: 1px dashed var(--tsb-border); display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 10px; flex-wrap: wrap; } .team-standup-board .escalate-btn { font-size: 11px; font-weight: 700; border-radius: var(--tsb-radius-sm); transition: all var(--tsb-transition); } .team-standup-board .escalate-btn:hover { transform: scale(1.03); box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.4); } .team-standup-board .blocker-age { font-size: 11px; color: var(--tsb-danger); font-weight: 600; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 4px; } .team-standup-board .task-created-badge { margin-top: 10px; padding: 6px 10px; background: var(--tsb-success-light); border-radius: var(--tsb-radius-sm); font-size: 12px; color: var(--tsb-success); font-weight: 600; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 4px; } .team-standup-board .task-created-badge a { color: var(--tsb-primary); font-weight: 700; text-decoration: underline; } /* ===== MANAGER DASHBOARD ===== */ .team-standup-board .manager-dashboard { background: var(--tsb-card-bg); border-radius: var(--tsb-radius-md); box-shadow: var(--tsb-shadow-sm); padding: 24px; margin-top: 8px; border: 1px solid var(--tsb-border); } .team-standup-board .dashboard-header { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 20px; } .team-standup-board .dashboard-header h2 { font-size: 20px; font-weight: 700; color: var(--tsb-text-primary); margin: 0; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; } .team-standup-board .toggle-dashboard-btn { font-size: 13px; font-weight: 600; color: var(--tsb-primary); } .team-standup-board .cross-team-summary h3, .team-standup-board .blocker-heatmap h3 { font-size: 16px; font-weight: 700; color: var(--tsb-text-primary); margin: 0 0 16px 0; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; } .team-standup-board .team-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(240px, 1fr)); gap: 14px; margin-bottom: 28px; } .team-standup-board .team-summary-card { background: var(--tsb-bg); border-radius: var(--tsb-radius-sm); padding: 16px; border: 1px solid var(--tsb-border); transition: all var(--tsb-transition); margin: 0 0 12px 0; } .team-standup-board .team-stats .stat { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: 8px; gap: 8px; } .team-standup-board .stat-label { font-size: 12px; border-radius: 3px; transition: width 0.6s ease; } .team-standup-board .stat-bar-fill.low { background: var(--tsb-danger); } .team-standup-board .stat-bar-fill.medium { background: var(--tsb-warning); } .team-standup-board .stat-bar-fill.high { background: var(--tsb-success); } .team-standup-board .stat-value { font-size: 13px; font-weight: 700; color: var(--tsb-text-primary); min-width: 35px; text-align: right; } .team-standup-board .blocker-count.text-danger { color: var(--tsb-danger) !important; } .team-standup-board .blocker-count.text-success { color: var(--tsb-success) !important; } /* ===== HEATMAP ===== */ .team-standup-board .blocker-heatmap { margin-top: 4px; } .team-standup-board .heatmap-container { overflow-x: auto; } .team-standup-board .heatmap-team-labels { display: flex; gap: 6px; padding-left: 100px; margin-bottom: 4px; } .team-standup-board .heatmap-corner-label { display: none; } .team-standup-board .heatmap-team-label { width: 40px; font-size: 9px; font-weight: 700; color: var(--tsb-text-muted); text-align: center; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; text-transform: uppercase; } .team-standup-board .heatmap-row { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px; margin-bottom: 4px; } .team-standup-board .day-label { width: 94px; font-size: 12px; color: var(--tsb-text-secondary); font-weight: 600; text-align: right; padding-right: 6px; flex-shrink: 0; } .team-standup-board .heatmap-cells { display: flex; gap: 4px; } .team-standup-board .heatmap-cell { width: 40px; height: 28px; box-shadow: var(--tsb-shadow-sm); } .team-standup-board .cell-count { font-size: 10px; font-weight: 800; color: #fff; } .team-standup-board .heatmap-cell.level-0 { background: #ebedf0; } .team-standup-board .heatmap-cell.level-0 .cell-count { color: var(--tsb-text-muted); } .team-standup-board .heatmap-cell.level-1 { background: #fdd; } .team-standup-board .heatmap-cell.level-1 .cell-count { color: var(--tsb-danger); } .team-standup-board .heatmap-cell.level-2 { background: #f99; } .team-standup-board .heatmap-cell.level-3 { background: #e55; } .team-standup-board .heatmap-cell.level-4 { background: #c82333; } .team-standup-board .heatmap-legend { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; margin-top: 12px; justify-content: flex-end; } .team-standup-board .legend-label { font-size: 11px; color: var(--tsb-text-muted); font-weight: 600; } .team-standup-board .legend-scale { display: flex; } .team-standup-board .legend-cell.level-2 { background: #f99; } .team-standup-board .legend-cell.level-3 { background: #e55; } .team-standup-board .legend-cell.level-4 { background: #c82333; } /* ===== REFRESH & TOAST ===== */ .team-standup-board .refresh-indicator { position: fixed; bottom: 20px; right: 20px; background: var(--tsb-card-bg); color: var(--tsb-text-secondary); padding: 8px 16px; border-radius: 20px; font-size: 12px; font-weight: 600; box-shadow: var(--tsb-shadow-md); z-index: 5000; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px; animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease; } .team-standup-board .toast-notification { position: fixed; top: 20px; right: 20px; z-index: 11000; padding: 14px 20px; border-radius: var(--tsb-radius-sm); font-size: 14px; font-weight: 600; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 10px; box-shadow: var(--tsb-shadow-lg); animation: toastSlideIn 0.35s ease-out; max-width: 400px; } @keyframes toastSlideIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(100px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } } .team-standup-board .toast-success { background: var(--tsb-success); color: #fff; } .team-standup-board .toast-error { background: var(--tsb-danger); color: #fff; } .team-standup-board .toast-info { background: var(--tsb-info); color: #fff; } .team-standup-board .toast-close { background: none; } to { opacity: 1; } } /* ===== RESPONSIVE: TABLET ===== */ @media (max-width: 1024px) { .team-standup-board { padding: 16px; } .team-standup-board .participation-metrics { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); } .team-standup-board .header-actions { flex-wrap: wrap; } .team-standup-board .header-actions .standup-btn { flex: 1; min-width: 120px; justify-content: center; } .team-standup-board .participation-metrics { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); align-items: flex-start; } .team-standup-board .card-actions { align-self: flex-end; } .team-standup-board .standup-form-card { max-height: 95vh; border-radius: var(--tsb-radius-md); } .team-standup-board .date-picker-controls { flex-direction: column; } .team-standup-board .entry-card { break-inside: avoid; box-shadow: none; border: 1px solid #ccc; } } /* ===== FOCUS MANAGEMENT FOR WCAG ===== */ .team-standup-board *:focus-visible { outline: 2px solid var(--tsb-primary); sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fix_8c0f93a79376365013b7326efaba1088
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description/><name>Prerequisites and Test Data</name><record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[/**
 * WIDGET_0001 - Provision Widget Prerequisites and Test Data
 *
 * Purpose: Verifies the complete Daily Standup Widget ecosystem and provisions
 *          demo data so the widget is immediately functional. Creates a demo
 *          team group, adds members, sets manager, creates sample standup
 *          entries with reactions, and creates an escalated blocker with task.
 *
 * PREREQUISITE: Scripts 1 and 2 must be run first (CreateStandupEntryFields
 *               and CreateStandupReactionFields) so all fields exist.
 *
 * Update Set: WIDGET_0001_StandupWidgetProvisioning
 *
 * @author Wave Inguane
 * @date 2026-02-07
 * @version 1.1.0
 * @story WIDGET_0001
 * @scope Global
 *
 * REMEDIATION APPLIED (from Phase 9 Self-Critique):
 * - L-3: Added comment about function hoisting for helper functions
 *
 * Provisions:
 * - Demo team group ("Standup Demo Team")
 * - Group members (current user + 2 active users)
 * - Current user as group manager
 * - 6 sample standup entries (3 today + 3 yesterday)
 * - ~10 sample reactions on entries
 * - 1 escalated blocker with task reference
 */

// ============================================================================
// CONFIGURATION
// ============================================================================

var DRY_RUN = false;
var STANDUP_TABLE = 'u_standup_entry';
var REACTION_TABLE = 'u_standup_reaction';
var DEMO_GROUP_NAME = 'Standup Demo Team';

// Required fields on each table (used for validation)
var REQUIRED_ENTRY_FIELDS = [
    'u_user', 'u_date', 'u_yesterday_text', 'u_today_text',
    'u_blockers_text', 'u_team', 'u_is_urgent', 'u_task_reference'
];
var REQUIRED_REACTION_FIELDS = [
    'u_standup_entry', 'u_user', 'u_reaction_type'
];

// Sample standup text content
var SAMPLE_DATA = {
    today: [
        {
            yesterday: 'Completed API integration for the notification service',
            today: 'Working on unit tests for the API endpoints',
            blockers: '',
            isUrgent: false
        },
        {
            yesterday: 'Fixed login bug affecting SSO users',
            today: 'Code review for the authentication module',
            blockers: 'Waiting on database access credentials from DBA team',
            isUrgent: false
        },
        {
            yesterday: 'Design review meeting with UX team',
            today: 'Building frontend components for the dashboard',
            blockers: '',
            isUrgent: false
        }
    ],
    yesterday: [
        {
            yesterday: 'Sprint planning and backlog grooming',
            today: 'Start API integration for notifications',
            blockers: '',
            isUrgent: false
        },
        {
            yesterday: 'Updated technical documentation',
            today: 'Fix login bug for SSO users',
            blockers: 'Build server is down since yesterday morning',
            isUrgent: true
        },
        {
            yesterday: 'Database schema migration planning',
            today: 'Design review meeting with UX',
            blockers: '',
            isUrgent: false
        }
    ]
};

// Reaction types used by the widget
var REACTION_TYPES = ['thumbsup', 'eyes', 'celebrate'];

// ============================================================================
// MAIN EXECUTION
// ============================================================================

// L-3 Note: Helper functions (validateTableFields, createStandupEntry,
// createReaction) are declared at the bottom of the IIFE. JavaScript function
// declarations are hoisted to the top of their scope, so they are available
// throughout the function body including the try block above them.

(function executeProvisionWidgetPrerequisites() {
    'use strict';

    var scriptName = 'WIDGET_0001_Provision';
    var startTime = new GlideDateTime();

    gs.info('[{0}] ========================================', scriptName);
    gs.info('[{0}] Starting Widget Ecosystem Provisioning', scriptName);
    gs.info('[{0}] DRY_RUN Mode: {1}', scriptName, DRY_RUN);
    gs.info('[{0}] ========================================', scriptName);

    var stats = {
        validationsPassed: 0,
        validationsFailed: 0,
        groupCreated: false,
        membersAdded: 0,
        entriesCreated: 0,
        reactionsCreated: 0,
        tasksCreated: 0,
        errors: 0
    };

    try {
        // ====================================================================
        // STEP 1: Validate both tables exist with all required fields
        // ====================================================================
        gs.info('[{0}] --- Step 1: Validating table schemas ---', scriptName);

        var entryFieldsOk = validateTableFields(scriptName, STANDUP_TABLE, REQUIRED_ENTRY_FIELDS, stats);
        var reactionFieldsOk = validateTableFields(scriptName, REACTION_TABLE, REQUIRED_REACTION_FIELDS, stats);

        if (!entryFieldsOk || !reactionFieldsOk) {
            gs.error('[{0}] VALIDATION FAILED: Missing fields detected. Run Scripts 1 and 2 first.', scriptName);
            return { success: false, error: 'Missing required fields', stats: stats };
        }
        gs.info('[{0}] All field validations passed', scriptName);

        // ====================================================================
        // STEP 2: Create or find demo team group
        // ====================================================================
        gs.info('[{0}] --- Step 2: Provisioning demo team group ---', scriptName);

        var currentUserId = gs.getUserID();
        var groupSysId = '';

        // Check if group already exists
        var grGroupCheck = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
        grGroupCheck.addQuery('name', DEMO_GROUP_NAME);
        grGroupCheck.setLimit(1);
        grGroupCheck.query();

        if (grGroupCheck.next()) {
            groupSysId = grGroupCheck.getUniqueValue();
            gs.info('[{0}]   FOUND existing group: "{1}" (sys_id={2})',
                    scriptName, DEMO_GROUP_NAME, groupSysId);
        } else {
            if (DRY_RUN) {
                gs.info('[{0}]   [DRY_RUN] Would create group: "{1}"', scriptName, DEMO_GROUP_NAME);
                stats.groupCreated = true;
            } else {
                var grGroup = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
                grGroup.initialize();
                grGroup.setValue('name', DEMO_GROUP_NAME);
                grGroup.setValue('active', true);
                grGroup.setValue('manager', currentUserId);
                grGroup.setValue('description', 'Demo team for the Daily Standup Widget (WIDGET_0001)');
                groupSysId = grGroup.insert();
                if (groupSysId) {
                    stats.groupCreated = true;
                    gs.info('[{0}]   CREATED group: "{1}" (sys_id={2})',
                            scriptName, DEMO_GROUP_NAME, groupSysId);
                } else {
                    stats.errors++;
                    gs.error('[{0}]   ERROR: Failed to create group "{1}"',
                             scriptName, DEMO_GROUP_NAME);
                    return { success: false, error: 'Failed to create group', stats: stats };
                }
            }
        }

        // Set current user as manager (if group already existed)
        if (!DRY_RUN && groupSysId) {
            var grGroupUpdate = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
            if (grGroupUpdate.get(groupSysId)) {
                grGroupUpdate.setValue('manager', currentUserId);
                grGroupUpdate.update();
                gs.info('[{0}]   Set current user as group manager', scriptName);
            }
        }

        // ====================================================================
        // STEP 3: Find team members and add to group
        // ====================================================================
        gs.info('[{0}] --- Step 3: Adding team members ---', scriptName);

        var teamUserIds = [currentUserId];

        // Find 2 active users (not current user) with email
        var grUsers = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        grUsers.addQuery('active', true);
        grUsers.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', currentUserId);
        grUsers.addNotNullQuery('email');
        grUsers.addNotNullQuery('name');
        grUsers.setLimit(2);
        grUsers.orderBy('name');
        grUsers.query();

        while (grUsers.next()) {
            teamUserIds.push(grUsers.getUniqueValue());
            gs.info('[{0}]   Found team member: {1} ({2})',
                    scriptName, grUsers.getValue('name'), grUsers.getUniqueValue());
        }

        gs.info('[{0}]   Total team members: {1}', scriptName, teamUserIds.length);

        // Add each user to the group (if not already a member)
        for (var m = 0; m < teamUserIds.length; m++) {
            var userId = teamUserIds[m];

            // Check existing membership
            var grMemberCheck = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
            grMemberCheck.addQuery('group', groupSysId);
            grMemberCheck.addQuery('user', userId);
            grMemberCheck.setLimit(1);
            grMemberCheck.query();

            if (grMemberCheck.hasNext()) {
                gs.info('[{0}]   SKIP: User {1} already in group', scriptName, userId);
                continue;
            }

            if (DRY_RUN) {
                stats.membersAdded++;
                gs.info('[{0}]   [DRY_RUN] Would add user {1} to group', scriptName, userId);
            } else {
                var grMember = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
                grMember.initialize();
                grMember.setValue('group', groupSysId);
                grMember.setValue('user', userId);
                var memberInserted = grMember.insert();
                if (memberInserted) {
                    stats.membersAdded++;
                    gs.info('[{0}]   ADDED user {1} to group', scriptName, userId);
                } else {
                    stats.errors++;
                    gs.error('[{0}]   ERROR: Failed to add user {1} to group', scriptName, userId);
                }
            }
        }

        // ====================================================================
        // STEP 4: Create sample standup entries
        // ====================================================================
        gs.info('[{0}] --- Step 4: Creating sample standup entries ---', scriptName);

        var today = new GlideDate();
        var todayStr = today.getByFormat('yyyy-MM-dd');

        // Calculate yesterday's date
        var yesterdayDt = new GlideDateTime();
        yesterdayDt.addDaysLocalTime(-1);
        var yesterdayStr = yesterdayDt.getDate().getByFormat('yyyy-MM-dd');

        gs.info('[{0}]   Today: {1}, Yesterday: {2}', scriptName, todayStr, yesterdayStr);

        var createdEntryIds = [];

        // Create today's entries
        for (var t = 0; t < SAMPLE_DATA.today.length && t < teamUserIds.length; t++) {
            var todayEntry = SAMPLE_DATA.today[t];
            var todayUserId = teamUserIds[t];
            var todayEntryId = createStandupEntry(
                scriptName, todayUserId, todayStr, groupSysId,
                todayEntry.yesterday, todayEntry.today,
                todayEntry.blockers, todayEntry.isUrgent, stats
            );
            if (todayEntryId) {
                createdEntryIds.push({
                    sysId: todayEntryId,
                    userId: todayUserId,
                    date: todayStr,
                    hasBlocker: todayEntry.blockers.length > 0
                });
            }
        }

        // Create yesterday's entries
        for (var y = 0; y < SAMPLE_DATA.yesterday.length && y < teamUserIds.length; y++) {
            var yesterdayEntry = SAMPLE_DATA.yesterday[y];
            var yesterdayUserId = teamUserIds[y];
            var yesterdayEntryId = createStandupEntry(
                scriptName, yesterdayUserId, yesterdayStr, groupSysId,
                yesterdayEntry.yesterday, yesterdayEntry.today,
                yesterdayEntry.blockers, yesterdayEntry.isUrgent, stats
            );
            if (yesterdayEntryId) {
                createdEntryIds.push({
                    sysId: yesterdayEntryId,
                    userId: yesterdayUserId,
                    date: yesterdayStr,
                    hasBlocker: yesterdayEntry.blockers.length > 0,
                    isUrgent: yesterdayEntry.isUrgent
                });
            }
        }

        // ====================================================================
        // STEP 5: Create escalated blocker with task reference
        // ====================================================================
        gs.info('[{0}] --- Step 5: Creating escalated blocker task ---', scriptName);

        // Find the urgent blocker entry from yesterday (User 2)
        var urgentEntry = null;
        for (var u = 0; u < createdEntryIds.length; u++) {
            if (createdEntryIds[u].isUrgent && createdEntryIds[u].hasBlocker) {
                urgentEntry = createdEntryIds[u];
                break;
            }
        }

        if (urgentEntry) {
            if (DRY_RUN) {
                stats.tasksCreated++;
                gs.info('[{0}]   [DRY_RUN] Would create task for urgent blocker (entry={1})',
                        scriptName, urgentEntry.sysId);
            } else {
                var taskGr = new GlideRecord('task');
                taskGr.initialize();
                taskGr.setValue('short_description', '[Standup Blocker] Build server is down since yesterday morning');
                taskGr.setValue('description', 'Blocker reported during daily standup:\n\nBuild server is down since yesterday morning\n\nReported by: Team Member\nStandup Entry: ' + urgentEntry.sysId);
                taskGr.setValue('assigned_to', urgentEntry.userId);
                taskGr.setValue('assignment_group', groupSysId);
                taskGr.setValue('priority', '1');
                taskGr.setValue('urgency', '1');
                taskGr.setValue('impact', '2');
                taskGr.setValue('contact_type', 'self-service');
                var taskSysId = taskGr.insert();

                if (taskSysId) {
                    stats.tasksCreated++;
                    gs.info('[{0}]   CREATED task (sys_id={1})', scriptName, taskSysId);

                    // Update the entry with the task reference
                    var grEntryUpdate = new GlideRecord(STANDUP_TABLE);
                    if (grEntryUpdate.get(urgentEntry.sysId)) {
                        grEntryUpdate.setValue('u_task_reference', taskSysId);
                        grEntryUpdate.update();
                        gs.info('[{0}]   Updated entry {1} with task reference {2}',
                                scriptName, urgentEntry.sysId, taskSysId);
                    }
                } else {
                    stats.errors++;
                    gs.error('[{0}]   ERROR: Failed to create task', scriptName);
                }
            }
        } else {
            gs.info('[{0}]   No urgent blocker entry found to escalate (DRY_RUN or no entries created)',
                    scriptName);
        }

        // ====================================================================
        // STEP 6: Create sample reactions
        // ====================================================================
        gs.info('[{0}] --- Step 6: Creating sample reactions ---', scriptName);

        // Build reaction plan: react on created entries with different types
        var reactionPlan = [];

        for (var r = 0; r < createdEntryIds.length; r++) {
            var entry = createdEntryIds[r];

            // Each entry gets 1-2 reactions from other users
            for (var ru = 0; ru < teamUserIds.length; ru++) {
                // Skip self-reactions
                if (teamUserIds[ru] === entry.userId) {
                    continue;
                }

                // Assign reaction type based on content
                var reactionType;
                if (entry.hasBlocker) {
                    reactionType = 'eyes';
                } else if (r % 3 === 0) {
                    reactionType = 'celebrate';
                } else {
                    reactionType = 'thumbsup';
                }

                reactionPlan.push({
                    entryId: entry.sysId,
                    userId: teamUserIds[ru],
                    reactionType: reactionType
                });

                // Limit to ~10 reactions total
                if (reactionPlan.length >= 10) {
                    break;
                }
            }
            if (reactionPlan.length >= 10) {
                break;
            }
        }

        for (var rp = 0; rp < reactionPlan.length; rp++) {
            var reaction = reactionPlan[rp];
            createReaction(scriptName, reaction.entryId, reaction.userId, reaction.reactionType, stats);
        }

        // ====================================================================
        // STEP 7: Final ecosystem validation
        // ====================================================================
        gs.info('[{0}] --- Step 7: Ecosystem validation ---', scriptName);

        if (!DRY_RUN) {
            // Count entries
            var grEntryCount = new GlideRecord(STANDUP_TABLE);
            grEntryCount.addQuery('u_team', groupSysId);
            grEntryCount.query();
            gs.info('[{0}]   Standup entries for demo team: {1}',
                    scriptName, grEntryCount.getRowCount());

            // Count reactions
            var grReactionCount = new GlideRecord(REACTION_TABLE);
            grReactionCount.query();
            gs.info('[{0}]   Total reactions: {1}',
                    scriptName, grReactionCount.getRowCount());

            // Verify group membership
            var grMemberCount = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
            grMemberCount.addQuery('group', groupSysId);
            grMemberCount.query();
            gs.info('[{0}]   Group members: {1}',
                    scriptName, grMemberCount.getRowCount());

            // Verify manager
            var grGroupVerify = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
            if (grGroupVerify.get(groupSysId)) {
                var managerIsSet = grGroupVerify.getValue('manager') === currentUserId;
                gs.info('[{0}]   Manager set correctly: {1}', scriptName, managerIsSet);
            }
        } else {
            gs.info('[{0}]   [DRY_RUN] Skipping ecosystem validation counts', scriptName);
        }

        // ====================================================================
        // SUMMARY
        // ====================================================================
        var endTime = new GlideDateTime();
        var duration = GlideDateTime.subtract(startTime, endTime);

        gs.info('[{0}] ========================================', scriptName);
        gs.info('[{0}] PROVISIONING SUMMARY', scriptName);
        gs.info('[{0}] Mode: {1}', scriptName, DRY_RUN ? 'DRY_RUN' : 'LIVE');
        gs.info('[{0}] Execution Time: {1}', scriptName, duration.getDisplayValue());
        gs.info('[{0}] Validations Passed: {1} | Failed: {2}',
                scriptName, stats.validationsPassed, stats.validationsFailed);
        gs.info('[{0}] Group Created: {1}', scriptName, stats.groupCreated);
        gs.info('[{0}] Members Added: {1}', scriptName, stats.membersAdded);
        gs.info('[{0}] Entries {1}: {2}',
                scriptName, DRY_RUN ? 'WouldCreate' : 'Created', stats.entriesCreated);
        gs.info('[{0}] Reactions {1}: {2}',
                scriptName, DRY_RUN ? 'WouldCreate' : 'Created', stats.reactionsCreated);
        gs.info('[{0}] Tasks {1}: {2}',
                scriptName, DRY_RUN ? 'WouldCreate' : 'Created', stats.tasksCreated);
        gs.info('[{0}] Errors: {1}', scriptName, stats.errors);

        if (DRY_RUN) {
            gs.info('[{0}] DRY_RUN complete. Set DRY_RUN = false to apply changes.', scriptName);
        } else {
            gs.info('[{0}] Widget ecosystem is ready! Navigate to Service Portal to use the Daily Standup Widget.', scriptName);
        }
        gs.info('[{0}] ========================================', scriptName);

        return { success: true, dryRun: DRY_RUN, stats: stats };

    } catch (e) {
        gs.error('[{0}] FATAL ERROR: {1}', scriptName, e.message);
        return { success: false, error: e.message, stats: stats };
    }

    // ========================================================================
    // HELPER FUNCTIONS
    // L-3: These function declarations are hoisted to the top of the IIFE
    // scope by the JavaScript engine, making them available throughout the
    // function body including the try block above.
    // ========================================================================

    /**
     * Validates that all required fields exist on a given table.
     *
     * @param {String} logPrefix - Script name for logging
     * @param {String} tableName - Target table to validate
     * @param {Array} requiredFields - Array of required field element names
     * @param {Object} statsObj - Statistics tracking object
     * @returns {Boolean} True if all fields exist
     */
    function validateTableFields(logPrefix, tableName, requiredFields, statsObj) {
        var allExist = true;

        // Verify table exists
        var grTable = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
        grTable.addQuery('name', tableName);
        grTable.addQuery('internal_type', 'collection');
        grTable.setLimit(1);
        grTable.query();
        if (!grTable.hasNext()) {
            statsObj.validationsFailed++;
            gs.error('[{0}]   FAIL: Table "{1}" does not exist', logPrefix, tableName);
            return false;
        }
        statsObj.validationsPassed++;
        gs.info('[{0}]   OK: Table "{1}" exists', logPrefix, tableName);

        // Check each required field
        for (var f = 0; f < requiredFields.length; f++) {
            var fieldName = requiredFields[f];
            var grField = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
            grField.addQuery('name', tableName);
            grField.addQuery('element', fieldName);
            grField.setLimit(1);
            grField.query();

            if (grField.hasNext()) {
                statsObj.validationsPassed++;
                gs.info('[{0}]   OK: Field "{1}.{2}" exists', logPrefix, tableName, fieldName);
            } else {
                statsObj.validationsFailed++;
                allExist = false;
                gs.error('[{0}]   FAIL: Field "{1}.{2}" is MISSING', logPrefix, tableName, fieldName);
            }
        }

        return allExist;
    }

    /**
     * Creates a single standup entry record.
     *
     * @param {String} logPrefix - Script name for logging
     * @param {String} userId - sys_user sys_id
     * @param {String} dateStr - Date in yyyy-MM-dd format
     * @param {String} groupId - sys_user_group sys_id
     * @param {String} yesterdayText - Yesterday text
     * @param {String} todayText - Today text
     * @param {String} blockersText - Blockers text
     * @param {Boolean} isUrgent - Urgent flag
     * @param {Object} statsObj - Statistics tracking object
     * @returns {String|null} sys_id of created record, or null
     */
    function createStandupEntry(logPrefix, userId, dateStr, groupId, yesterdayText, todayText, blockersText, isUrgent, statsObj) {
        // Check if entry already exists for this user/date/team
        var grCheck = new GlideRecord(STANDUP_TABLE);
        grCheck.addQuery('u_user', userId);
        grCheck.addQuery('u_date', dateStr);
        grCheck.addQuery('u_team', groupId);
        grCheck.setLimit(1);
        grCheck.query();

        if (grCheck.hasNext()) {
            gs.info('[{0}]   SKIP: Entry already exists for user {1} on {2}',
                    logPrefix, userId, dateStr);
            grCheck.next();
            return grCheck.getUniqueValue();
        }

        if (DRY_RUN) {
            statsObj.entriesCreated++;
            gs.info('[{0}]   [DRY_RUN] Would create entry for user {1} on {2} (blocker={3})',
                    logPrefix, userId, dateStr, blockersText ? 'YES' : 'NO');
            return 'dry_run_' + userId + '_' + dateStr;
        }

        try {
            var gr = new GlideRecord(STANDUP_TABLE);
            gr.initialize();
            gr.setValue('u_user', userId);
            gr.setValue('u_date', dateStr);
            gr.setValue('u_yesterday_text', yesterdayText);
            gr.setValue('u_today_text', todayText);
            gr.setValue('u_blockers_text', blockersText);
            gr.setValue('u_team', groupId);
            gr.setValue('u_is_urgent', isUrgent);
            var entrySysId = gr.insert();

            if (entrySysId) {
                statsObj.entriesCreated++;
                gs.info('[{0}]   CREATED entry for user {1} on {2} (sys_id={3})',
                        logPrefix, userId, dateStr, entrySysId);
                return entrySysId;
            } else {
                statsObj.errors++;
                gs.error('[{0}]   ERROR: Failed to create entry for user {1} on {2}',
                         logPrefix, userId, dateStr);
                return null;
            }
        } catch (entryError) {
            statsObj.errors++;
            gs.error('[{0}]   ERROR creating entry: {1}', logPrefix, entryError.message);
            return null;
        }
    }

    /**
     * Creates a single reaction record.
     *
     * @param {String} logPrefix - Script name for logging
     * @param {String} entryId - u_standup_entry sys_id
     * @param {String} userId - sys_user sys_id
     * @param {String} reactionType - Reaction type (thumbsup/eyes/celebrate)
     * @param {Object} statsObj - Statistics tracking object
     */
    function createReaction(logPrefix, entryId, userId, reactionType, statsObj) {
        // Check if reaction already exists
        var grCheck = new GlideRecord(REACTION_TABLE);
        grCheck.addQuery('u_standup_entry', entryId);
        grCheck.addQuery('u_user', userId);
        grCheck.addQuery('u_reaction_type', reactionType);
        grCheck.setLimit(1);
        grCheck.query();

        if (grCheck.hasNext()) {
            gs.info('[{0}]   SKIP: Reaction already exists ({1} by {2} on {3})',
                    logPrefix, reactionType, userId, entryId);
            return;
        }

        if (DRY_RUN) {
            statsObj.reactionsCreated++;
            gs.info('[{0}]   [DRY_RUN] Would create reaction: {1} by {2} on entry {3}',
                    logPrefix, reactionType, userId, entryId);
            return;
        }

        try {
            var gr = new GlideRecord(REACTION_TABLE);
            gr.initialize();
            gr.setValue('u_standup_entry', entryId);
            gr.setValue('u_user', userId);
            gr.setValue('u_reaction_type', reactionType);
            var reactionSysId = gr.insert();

            if (reactionSysId) {
                statsObj.reactionsCreated++;
                gs.info('[{0}]   CREATED reaction: {1} by {2} (sys_id={3})',
                        logPrefix, reactionType, userId, reactionSysId);
            } else {
                statsObj.errors++;
                gs.error('[{0}]   ERROR: Failed to create reaction', logPrefix);
            }
        } catch (reactionError) {
            statsObj.errors++;
            gs.error('[{0}]   ERROR creating reaction: {1}', logPrefix, reactionError.message);
        }
    }
})();
